caption: www.peoplesskype.org
description: The People's Mic works well for small General Assemblies, but in larger 				  GAs, multiple echoes of the speaker's words is hard to follow.
message: A wretched name, but an awesome idea. A free broadcast-only teleconference for the Occupy movement. Call in to hear the speaker on your phone, then relay it a la "People's Mic", or simply use your speakerphone. Also supports instant voting via the phone keypad.
name: The People's Skype
